inputs.remark:
缺少三个 visit。
V3（新耳模印模制作，larger vent 重做，失败）。
V5（Helix 修改失败，患者透露 pacemaker 病史，复制旧设备尝试）。
V6（心脏科评估，2000-4000Hz 增益调整建议，调整无效）。

logic_summary: Replaced expected_interpretations_by_visit to include missing visits V3, V5, and V6 as per remarks.
Inserted V3 (Oct 2019): Remake with larger vent failed.
Renumbered old V3 to V4 (Nov 2019): Cotton ball troubleshooting.
Inserted V5 (Jan 2020): Helix modification failed, pacemaker noted, replicate old fit.
Inserted V6 (Post-Jan 2020): Cardiology eval, gain reduction 2-4kHz failed.
Renumbered old V4 to V7 (Sep 2020): Imaging and Redwing modification.

value.collective_interpretation: Routine evaluation revealed symmetric moderate-to-profound sensorineural hearing loss with poor-to-fair word recognition, stable since 2013.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRT 65 dB HL AU; WRS 48% (Right) and 64% (Left) at 95 dB HL.

value.collective_interpretation: Initial fit of new ITE devices. Patient reported immediate pulsatile tinnitus in the left ear. Fine-tuning adjustments (gain reduction) were unsuccessful.
New open jaw earmold impressions were made and the device was remade with a larger vent, but the pulsatile tinnitus persisted.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Remake with larger vent failed to resolve pulsatile tinnitus.

value.collective_interpretation: Troubleshooting visit. Mechanical manipulation (wedging a cotton ball) eliminated the pulsatile tinnitus, suggesting a physical fit issue rather than gain settings.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Physical pressure on the device near the triangular fossa (cotton ball) eliminated the pulsatile tinnitus.

value.collective_interpretation: Helix modification failed to resolve symptoms. Patient disclosed pacemaker history. Devices sent to replicate physical fit of previous successful hearing aids.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Helix build-up modification failed. Old devices sent for physical replication.

value.collective_interpretation: Cardiology evaluation yielded no findings. Recommended gain reduction (2000-4000 Hz) was attempted but ineffective.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Cardiology clearance obtained. Gain reduction at 2000-4000 Hz failed to relieve tinnitus.

value.collective_interpretation: Imaging revealed a temporal bone dehiscence. Based on this, the hearing aid was modified to reduce canal contact, which successfully resolved the pulsatile tinnitus.

tests.name: Imaging (CT Scan)
tests.result_summary: Dehiscence of the temporal bone portion separating the Eustachian tube from the internal carotid artery.

tests.name: Other
tests.result_summary: Redwing modification (tapering the device end) reduced canal contact and relieved the pulsatile tinnitus.
